name: bloodstained
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
with marks of blood on it or in it: Bloodstained clothing was found near the scene. He coughed, to see if his sputum was bloodstained.
responsible for the death or injury of many people, often in a cruel way: He had been regarded for decades as a bloodstained terrorist.
More examplesFewer examplesThe floor of the building was all bloodstained.He was last seen wearing bloodstained clothes and carrying a knife.They discovered a bloodstained body at the foot of the stairs.They remain as determined as ever to expose the truth about their country's bloodstained past.He said he did not wish to belong to the same club as the appalling, bloodstained old tyrant.
